index.title: Monero Tools
index.subtitle: Find the right tool for what you're trying to do.
index.description: Find the right Monero tool for what you're trying to do - explore the blockchain, build applications, or accept payments.

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: Block explorers, network monitors, and utilities for browsing the Monero blockchain.

blockExplorers.title: Block Explorers
blockExplorers.subtitle: View transactions, blocks, and on-chain data.

network.title: Network & Nodes
network.subtitle: Monitor the network, find nodes, and visualize activity.

utilities.title: Utilities
utilities.subtitle: Wallet generators, price comparisons, statistics, and archives.

blockExplorers.p2poolObserver: Unconventional explorer with miner proof verification (hides uncontested blocks)

network.moneroFail: Comprehensive node list and network map

utilities.monerotech: Tool to inspect wallet keys and addresses

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: These links are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute an endorsement by the Monero community. To suggest a tool,

develop.title: Develop
develop.subtitle: Libraries and SDKs for integrating Monero into your applications.

tools.moneroTs: TypeScript/JavaScript library for Node.js and browsers
tools.moneroPython: Python library with RPC and native bindings
tools.moneroOxide: Rust implementation of the Monero blockchain protocol
tools.moneroJava: Java library for Monero wallet and daemon RPC
tools.moneroCpp: C++ library for Monero wallet and daemon
tools.monerophp: PHP library for Monero wallet RPC
tools.goMoneroRpc: Go client for Monero wallet and daemon RPC

accept.title: Accept Payments
accept.subtitle: Payment processors and plugins for accepting Monero on your website or store.
